actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend section 213 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to assist in implementing fair share housing allocations.

summary.text: Provides for assistance under the Housing and Community Development Act in implementing fair share housing allocation formulae and other housing plans designed to meet the needs of lower income households.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 213 of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to assist in implementing fair share housing allocations.
